title: Restore codebase to Version 3 state

requirements.text: Restore all backend and frontend code files to their exact state as they existed in Version 3 draft

quotes: i want you to give me the version 3 draft that i made earlier

acceptanceCriteria: All files match the exact content from Version 3
No features or changes from later versions remain in the codebase
The application functions identically to Version 3

constraints: Must revert to Version 3 exactly without modifications
Do not preserve any changes made in versions after Version 3
nonGoals: Applying bug fixes not present in Version 3
